data.oai_dc:dc:
Data of harpacticoida from intertidal flat of the Chernaya River estuary, Gulf of Kandalaksha, White Sea in July-August, 2000.

The sampling was carried out during five sessions (16 subsamples each, by syringe corer 1.0 cm2), repeatedly on the same plot, a silty-sandy intertidal flat of the estuary. Salinity values varied between 16 and 20 ppm.

|36 occurrences
